title: Year of the Green Centre
creator_credit: Ken Taylor, Barry Paine, BBC and ABC-TV (Australia)
brief_description: In July 1973, Warren Bonython and Charles McGovern became the first people to cross the Simpson Desert on foot. In their tracks, followed an ABC/BBC film crew who describe the harsh terrain, the animal life and the lush vegetation that followed one of the wettest years in the region.
